title: Voice AI Companions: The $5 Billion Market Reshaping Human-Computer Interaction
description: How sub-second voice synthesis and persistent memory are creating a new category of AI applications—and what it means for the future of conversational AI. The AI companion market has quietly become one of the fastest-growing segments in consumer technology. While enterprise AI dominates headlines with productivity tools and automation platforms, a parallel revolution is unfolding [...]The post Voice AI Companions: The $5 Billion Market Reshaping Human-Computer Interaction appeared first on TechBullion.

title: OpenAI craze continues as Amazon plans to invest $10 billion in Sam Altman's AI startup: Report
description: According to the reports, Amazon's investment in OpenAI could exceed around $10 billion along with an agreement to use its AI chips.
